section.title: Binary installation
section.para: If you are downloading the binary files, you just have to include all the dll's from the downloaded file.

section.title: Source installation
section.para: To install the .netbridge, you have to download the source code and using maven to build the project. This will creates the all the dlls , which can be inclueded to every project.
The netbridge has some dependencies, which are generated as well and included in the zip file in the folder assembly/target.
If you use npanday in your project, instade of adding the file from the .netbridge zip (assembly/target), you can add the dependencies over npanday visual studio plugin.
